title: Absence
studio: Recorded, mixed, and mastered at Raygun Recording Studio from July to November 2020

reviews.author: Metal Temple
reviews.excerpt: ONE WITH THE RIVERBED is a five-piece Post-Metal band from Kalamazoo, Michigan. Since forming in 2017, the band has strived to push the boundaries of the genre by incorporating elements of Atmospheric Black Metal with ambient soundscapes, dissonant textures, and dynamic shifts. “Absence,” the band’s first full-length album following an EP in 2018, showcases these sonic progressions while exploring overarching themes of death and loss

reviews.author: gbhbl
reviews.excerpt: While dripping in cold and heartless ambience, the first track certainly leans more towards the black metal side of things. A raw style of black metal; the vocals howl like a wind blowing through a mountain passage, the guitars are sharp and bloodying, and the percussion has that tinny, old-school vibe that always works in this environment. At times, the embodiment of black metal but with shifts and twists that take things in a brand-new and often exciting direction

reviews.author: Labandzi
reviews.excerpt: Atmospheric name, atmospheric logo, atmospheric views of Michigan nature on the cover art, this is the American One With The Riverbed combining in their music atmosphere with the straightforwardness and aggression of experimental metal
